attributes.action: scrap the council tax and make it an income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: base the council tax on peoples earnings so the more well off can afford more and the minimum wage earners pay less if you earn more you should pay more higher earners can afford more its unfair to raise it every year when more often than not the lower wage earners dont get a pay rise to cover the council tax raise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
